verses.verse: He <WH376> that being often reproved<WH8433> hardeneth<WH7185> his neck<WH6203> Shall suddenly<WH6621> be destroyed<WH7665>, and that without remedy<WH4832>.
When the righteous<WH6662> are increased<WH7235>, the people<WH5971> rejoice<WH8055>; But when a wicked<WH7563> man beareth rule<WH4910>, the people<WH5971> sigh<WH584>.
Whoso <WH376> loveth<WH157> wisdom<WH2451> rejoiceth<WH8055> his father<WH1>; But he that keepeth company<WH7462> with harlots<WH2181> wasteth<WH6> his substance<WH1952>.
The king<WH4428> by justice<WH4941> establisheth<WH5975> the land<WH776>; But he<WH376> that exacteth gifts<WH8641> overthroweth it<WH2040>.
A man<WH1397> that flattereth<WH2505> his neighbor<WH7453> Spreadeth<WH6566> a net<WH7568> for his steps<WH6471>.
In the transgression<WH6588> of an evil<WH7451> man<WH376> there is a snare<WH4170>; But the righteous<WH6662> doth sing<WH7442> and rejoice<WH8056>.
The righteous<WH6662> taketh<WH3045> knowledge of the cause<WH1779> of the poor<WH1800>; The wicked<WH7563> hath not understanding<WH995> to know it<WH1847>.
Scoffers3944, 582 set<WH6315> a city<WH7151> in a flame<WH6315>; But wise<WH2450> men turn away<WH7725> wrath<WH639>.
If a wise<WH2450> man<WH376> hath a controversy<WH8199> with a foolish<WH191> man<WH376>, Whether he be angry<WH7264> or laugh<WH7832>, there will be no rest<WH5183>.
The bloodthirsty<WH582> hate<WH8130> him that is perfect<WH8535>; And as for the upright<WH3477>, they seek<WH1245> his life<WH5315>.
A fool<WH3684> uttereth<WH3318> all his anger<WH7307>; But a wise<WH2450> man keepeth<WH7623> it back and stilleth it<WH268>.
If a ruler<WH4910> hearkeneth<WH7181> to falsehood<WH1697>, All his servants<WH8334> are wicked<WH7563>.
The poor<WH7326> man<WH376> and the oppressor<WH8501> meet together<WH6298>; Jehovah<WH3068> lighteneth<WH215> the eyes<WH5869> of them both<WH8147>.
The king<WH4428> that faithfully<WH571> judgeth<WH8199> the poor<WH1800>, His throne<WH3678> shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5703>.
The rod<WH7626> and reproof<WH8433> give<WH5414> wisdom<WH2451>; But a child<WH5288> left<WH7971> to himself causeth shame<WH954> to his mother<WH517>.
When the wicked<WH7563> are increased<WH7235>, transgression<WH6588> increaseth<WH7235>; But the righteous<WH6662> shall look<WH7200> upon their fall<WH4658>.
Correct <WH3256> thy son<WH1121>, and he will give thee rest<WH5117>; Yea<WH5414>, he will give delight<WH4574> unto thy soul<WH5315>.
Where there is no vision<WH2377>, the people<WH5971> cast off restraint<WH6544>; But he that keepeth<WH8104> the law<WH8451>, happy is he<WH835>.
A servant<WH5650> will not be corrected<WH3256> by words<WH1697>; For though he understand<WH995>, he will not give heed<WH4617>.
Seest <WH2372> thou a man<WH376> that is hasty<WH213> in his words<WH1697>? There is more hope<WH8615> of a fool than of him<WH3684>.
He that delicately bringeth up<WH6445> his servant<WH5650> from a child<WH5290> Shall have him become a son<WH4497> at the last<WH319>.
An angry<WH639> man<WH376> stirreth up<WH1624> strife<WH4066>, And a wrathful<WH2534> man<WH1167> aboundeth in<WH7227> transgression<WH6588>.
A man<WH120>'s pride<WH1346> shall bring him low<WH8213>; But he that is of a lowly<WH8217> spirit<WH7307> shall obtain<WH8551> honor<WH3519>.
Whoso is partner<WH2505> with a thief<WH1590> hateth<WH8130> his own soul<WH5315>; He heareth<WH8085> the adjuration<WH423> and uttereth nothing<WH5046>.
The fear<WH2731> of man<WH120> bringeth<WH5414> a snare<WH4170>; But whoso putteth his trust<WH982> in Jehovah<WH3068> shall be safe<WH7682>.
Many <WH7227> seek<WH1245> the ruler<WH4910>'s favor<WH6440>; But a man<WH376>'s judgment<WH4941> cometh from Jehovah<WH3068>.
An unjust<WH5766> man<WH376> is an abomination<WH8441> to the righteous<WH6662>; And he that is upright<WH3477> in the way<WH1870> is an abomination<WH8441> to the wicked<WH7563>.
